dcterms:creator: Suraj Nair
Eric Mitchell
Kevin Chen
Silvio Savarese
Chelsea Finn
dcterms:description: The LOReL dataset contains 3000 episodes (150000 frames) of reinforcement learning that trains policies for different behaviors on the IKEA desk using online RL. The language instruction is annotated by leveraging crowd-sourcing, specifically Amazon Mechanical Turk, with a total of 1699 unique instructions.
dcterms:title: LOReL

dcterms:creator: Tianhe Yu
Deirdre Quillen

Ryan Julian
Karol Hausman
Chelsea Finn
Sergey Levine
dcterms:description: MetaWorld is a benchmark and evaluation for multi-task and meta reinforcement learning, providing a series of tasks for agents to learn from.
dcterms:title: MetaWorld

dcterms:creator: Abhishek Gupta
Vikash Kumar
Corey Lynch
Sergey Levine
Karol Hausman
dcterms:description: Franka Kitchen is an environment where agents learn to perform various tasks such as sliding open doors, turning on lights, and operating kitchen appliances.
dcterms:title: Franka Kitchen
